fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Detailed user performance data for the current FPL season.

Returns a tibble containing round-by-round performance info for a given user in the current FPL season.

userPerformance(user_id)

Arguments

user_id

FPL user ID (retrieve from the corresponding user's https://fantasy.premierleague.com team page URL).

Examples

userPerformance(user_id = 123)
#>           id movement points total_points    rank rank_sort overall_rank
#> 1        123      new     50           50  891657    891658       891657
